items.sentence: That was the first time that I'd ever seen Tom cry.
Tom got fired and was escorted out of the building.
Tom played a pivotal role in the company's success.
Tom denied he was the one who'd left the door open.
The first thing that we need to do is build a fire.
That building is more than three hundred years old.
It really hurt when I hit my thumb with the hammer.
Nothing seems to work the way it should be working.
Tom felt like everything was happening all at once.
Tom thought that he was destined for bigger things.
